file_content.text: Didn't think I'd see you again, after that wound you took on Corellia. In the leg, right?
I could do cartwheels with all the kolto they gave me. Guess they needed the men.
Wasn't that your second tour? Thought regulation was no more than two.
Rules get bent in wartime. Brass probably thought Corellia would be end of it.
But if the Empire didn't get the picture there, we'll make sure they get it here.
